page.title: 11PALLET HILL FARM AND STUD.
page.content: Intensive arable farming and grassland management are carried on here. The latter is A part of the Stud which has long been established. Ponies and hunters are bred, broken and schooled. There are 3 stallions and 5 pony mares. The Stud also caters for trainees wanting to take the National Pony Society Stud Assistant examination. At the moment there are 4 students, 3 of whom are there under the Youth Training Scheme and 1 is a working pupil. All aspects of breeding, breaking, schooling and producing for the show ring are covered, as well as stable and paddock management in the one year course.
